name: Spot the Difference
description: A challenging game where you need to find differences between two similar images related to the concept of Ribbis.

name: Bubble Pop Classic
description: Bubble Pop Classic is a fascinating bubble shooter game with a stage-based style, each with its challenge!

name: Crazy Motorcycle
description: An exciting motorcycle racing game with challenging tracks and stunts!

name: Moto X3M
description: A time trial bike racing game with 22 levels, wild stunts, and challenging obstacles.

name: Run 3
description: An addictive endless runner game set in space where you navigate through a series of challenging tunnels.

name: Slice Master
description: A fun and challenging fruit-slicing game where you swipe to slice various fruits while avoiding bombs.

name: Racing Limits
description: A high-speed racing game with multiple modes, realistic physics, and customizable cars.
